rules_text:
Miracle {2}{G} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
When Mistwoods Caretaker enters the battlefield, if you cast it for its miracle cost, distribute two +1/+1 counters among other creatures you control.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a counter on it.
